job title: Clinical Data Analyst in Columbia, SC at Providence Health
job description:
Job Description
Providence Health
Clinical Data Analyst Position Summary:
Abstract data for American College of Cardiology database using established database guidelines. Ensures data is collected accurately and timely. Identifies trends that need further investigation. Runs data completeness and threshold reports for system quality assurance. Collaborates with physicians and hospital departments on advance data needs. Follows Providence Health’s Mission, Vision, and Values.

Job Requirements
Qualifications/Specifications:
Excellent computer skills, verbal and written communication skills. Knowledge of medical terminology required. Ability to apply critical thinking skills to identify trends and variances. Ability to work with little or no supervision required.
  • Education: 4 year RN degree preferred and/or CV Tech.
  • Licensure/Certification: SC RN or CV Tech
    • *Professional Experience: 5 years of recent medical experience required, cardiac experience required.
    Equal opportunity and affirmative action employers and are looking for diversity in candidates for employment: Minority/Female/Disabled/Protected Veteran
